languages.text: {n}Площадка под ногами колдуна — огромный проходческий щит буровой установки. Этот могучий механизм способен разгрызть и подземные скалы, и адамантиумные переборки бункеров, укрытых в глубине.{/n}

{n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantine, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Площадка под ногами колдуна — огромный проходческий щит буровой установки. Этот могучий механизм способен разгрызть и подземные скалы, и адамантиумные переборки бункеров, укрытых в глубине.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantium, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个巫师脚下的平台是巨型钻头的隧道防护罩。这台威力巨大的机器可以轻而易举地刺穿地下的岩石，撕开用精金加固过的地堡墙壁，也可以吞噬一切其他可能潜伏在这颗行星深处的东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantine, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个巫师脚下的平台，是巨型钻头的隧道防护罩。这台威力巨大的机器可以轻而易举地刺穿地下的岩石，撕开用精金加固过的地堡墙壁，也可以吞噬一切其他可能潜伏在这颗行星深处的东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sorcier se tient sur l'imposant bouclier de la foreuse. Ce puissant mécanisme est capable de transpercer la roche souterraine, les cloisons des bunkers renforcées en adamantine et tout ce qui peut se cacher dans les entrailles de la planète.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantine, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sorcier se tient sur l'imposant bouclier de la foreuse. Ce puissant mécanisme est capable de transpercer la roche souterraine, les cloisons des bunkers renforcées en adamantium et tout ce qui peut se cacher dans les entrailles de la planète.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソーサラーが立っている足場は掘削機の巨大なトンネル掘削シールドだ。この強力な機械は地下の岩盤や、アダマンチウムで補強された地下壕の隔壁など、この惑星の深部に潜むあらゆるものを掘りおこすことができる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantine, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーサラーが立っている足場は掘削機の巨大なトンネル掘削シールドだ。この強力な機械は地下の岩盤や、アダマンチウムで補強された地下壕の隔壁など、この惑星の深部に潜むあらゆるものを掘りおこすことができる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La plataforma que sostiene al hechicero es el escudo de tunelado de la perforadora. Este magnífico mecanismo puede atravesar las rocas subterráneas, mamparas de búnker reforzadas con adamantino y cualquier otra cosa que se interponga en su camino hacia las profundidades del planeta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantine, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La plataforma que sostiene al hechicero es el escudo de tunelado de la perforadora. Este magnífico mecanismo puede atravesar las rocas subterráneas, mamparas de búnker reforzadas con adamantio y cualquier otra cosa que se interponga en su camino hacia las profundidades del planeta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Plattform unter den Füßen des Hexers ist der massive Tunnelbauschild der Bohrmaschine. Dieser mächtige Mechanismus kann sich durch unterirdisches Gestein graben, durch adamant-verstärkte Bunkerschotten sowie durch alles andere, was in den Tiefen des Planeten lauern mag.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantine, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Plattform unter den Füßen des Hexers ist der massive Tunnelbauschild der Bohrmaschine. Dieser mächtige Mechanismus kann sich durch unterirdisches Gestein graben, durch adamantium-verstärkte Bunkerschotten sowie durch alles andere, was in den Tiefen des Planeten lauern mag.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sahir, kazı makinesinin devasa tünel kalkanının üzerinde duruyor. Bu kudretli mekanizma, yer altındaki kayaların ve adamantinle güçlendirilmiş sığınak bölme panellerinin yanı sıra gezegenin derinliklerinde pusuya yatan her şeyi çiğneyip geçebilecek bir güce kadir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The platform beneath the sorcerer's feet is the drilling machine's massive tunnelling shield. This mighty mechanism can gnaw through underground rock, bunker bulkheads reinforced with adamantine, or anything else that may lurk in the planet's depths.{/n}
